notes.text:
An update is available for criu, libslirp, module.slirp4netns, module.libslirp, module.criu, slirp4netns, module.runc, runc.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
The container-tools module contains tools for working with containers, notably podman, buildah, skopeo, and runc.

Bug Fix(es):

* Podman containers do not start after upgrade to v4.4.1 (BZ#2176833)

* Cannot use podman container checkpoint if utilizing crun ociRuntime (BZ#2179195)

* [Regression] podman-4.4.0-1.el9 breaks checkpoint/restore (BZ#2179451)

* Containers with custom policy fails to start on OCP 4.13 duo to access denial to devices (BZ#2179466)

* --health-on-failure=restart doesn't restart container (BZ#2180125)

* keep-id generates an entry in /etc/resolv.conf if used with podman (BZ#2182491)

* --dns-add command is not functioning (BZ#2182897)

* docker login compatibility issue (BZ#2183601)

* Error: mount /var/lib/containers/storage/overlay:/var/lib/containers/storage/overlay, flags: 0x1000: operation not permitted (BZ#2183667)

* could not find symbol `criu_set_lsm_mount_context` in `libcriu.so` (BZ#2184221)

* Rootless podman with additionalimagestore does not work on Rocky Linux8.6 (BZ#2185132)

* Remove default pre-exec hook directories. (BZ#2189593)

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: * Error: mount /var/lib/containers/storage/overlay:/var/lib/containers/storage/overlay, flags: 0x1000: operation not permitted
* Rootless podman with additionalimagestore does not work on RHEL8.6
* Podman containers do not start after upgrade to v4.4.1
* Containers with custom policy fails to start on OCP 4.13 duo to access denial to devices
* keep-id generates an entry in /etc/resolv.conf if used with podman
Red Hat CSAF document for RLBA-2023:3089
